Class FSysLogger

java.lang.Object

public class FSysLogger
extends Object

Use FSysLogger to load ISysLoggers and ISysLogFormatters.

Udo Friedrich

createLoggerManager

public static ISysLoggerManager createLoggerManager(ISysConfigItem configItem)
                                             throws CSysLoggerException,
                                                    CSysConfigException
Load the logger manager by name.

Parameters:
configItem - The configruation item from which the logger manager is loaded.
Returns:
the created ISysLoggerManager.
Throws:
CSysLoggerException - if the creation fails
CSysConfigException - if the configuration is wrong
